text: avar avisvasiccat peale ninnalum avisvasikkukayum, annane ninnalellam orupealeyayittirukayum ceyyanan avar keatikkunnat‌. atinal avar allahuvinre margattil svantam nat vittuvarunnatu vare avaril ninn ninnal mitrannale svikaricc peakarut‌. ennal avar pintirinn kalayukayanenkil ninnalavare pitikutukayum, avare kantumuttiyetattuvecc ninnalavare kealappetuttukayum ceyyuka. avaril ninn yatearu mitratteyum sahayiyeyum ninnal svikariccu peakarut‌
